law.catch_line: Where action for maintenance or dissolution must be brought.
law.text: An action for maintenance or dissolution must be brought in the county where the husband or wife usually resides.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 76.
